section.para: Represents one of several allowed values for the language property of etymon objects. Note that as etymologies frequently refer to languages that are not covered by ISO standards it is necessary to define codes for all languages used in definitions.
section.programlisting: etymonLanguage: <value> iso639-1: (0..1) <string of 2 lowercase letters> iso639-3: (0..1) <string of 3 uppercase letters> displayValue: (0..1) <string>

listitem.para: The language may be specified with either iso639-1 and/or iso639-3 code in the ISO 639 standard if it exists
value indicates value used by the language property of a etymon (e.g. ger). displayValue indicates a natural language name for the language, e.g., “Modern High German”
